author: jgm
content:
I wouldn't want keys holding real funds and test funds shouldn't come from the same seed, there's too much chance to muck something up.

We should have enough methods in place to separate out keys for different networks (different wallet names, different paths, _etc._)  Not sure that this would bring anything more in terms of security, and it would lead to additional complexity throughout the tooling.
